p1: Passionate, result-oriented, reliable, team player. A big fan of Vue and React.
p2: The moment I wrote my first lines of code, I knew that I found myself. What I love about web development is that it helped me in rediscovering and reinvigorating my creativity. The combination of design and logic is what I was looking for.
p3: I develop my skills both through self-study and under the supervision of experienced developers. I have managed to create Landing Pages, participate in group projects on a big scale, code many small and more advanced applications covering a great number of different technologies related to Vue & React.
p4: I constantly strive to deliver the most effective solution to the challenge.
